resources.string:
Click Register, If you agree to our terms and conditions.
You will receive verification mail.
By proceeding you agree to our terms and conditions.

Groups have UNLIMITED MEMBERSHIP. 
 You can make groups to 
 
 PREPARE FOR : Competitive Exams, Interviews
 DISCUSS : Projects, Assignment, Books
 ORGANISE : Study Groups, Local meetups
Increase your : Profile Rank, Post Views, Connection Requests
Your Kriger Score is the number of people who joined YOU in the mission of making India 100% literate. Benefits of inviting friends.
Your Kriger Score is the number of people who joined YOU in the mission of making India 100% literate.
How can YOU make India 100% literate?

Discuss : Questions, Concepts, Chapters
Share : Notes
Help aspirants with : Exam preparation tips, Interview tips, College experience
Update : Exam & form dates
Post to build your personal brand and grow your network. \n \n Here are the most important posting guidelines
Build your network before you need it

Unlike WhatsApp and Telegram
1.Kriger Groups have an unlimited membership.
2.You can add members from across Kriger Network without the need of saving their details.
3.Every post and its comments are separate from each other to help you keep track of the discussion.

You can create groups for academic purposes for example

1.Internships
2.Placements
3.Competitive exams
4.Interview preparation
5.General Knowledge
6.English Vocabulary
7.Job updates
8.Group Discussions
9.Group projects
10.College committees

Please note you are allowed to create a ‘Group’ at Kriger Campus app solely for academic purposes.

A Group has NO membership limit.

Still, it’s suggested to keep the members count small for easy management of communication.

A group has to be responsibly managed by its owners and admins.

Avoid adding minors and strangers in your group.

The practice of hate speech, sensationalism, fear-mongering, and unparliamentary language is not at all allowed.

Create group only for academic purposes.
 
Groups have no membership limit still don’t create huge groups which you can’t moderate.
 
Group owner and admins are responsible for the members added and content posted by those members.
 
Don’t create groups with minors who don’t know each other – no parent wants their kids talking to strangers.
 
The group is not a political platform no unparliamentary, explicit, adult or irrelevant information no arguing, no heated opinions, no fear mongering, no hyped up drama, no fake news. Check your sources before you share.
 
Don’t add random people.
<font color=#F44336>Any instance of non-adherence or violation of these guidelines may be legally punishable under IT act, IPC & Cybercrime Law.</font>
Connect with other krigers to grow your network.

Grow your knowledge by sharing photo, text or file.
Don’t post any political or unparliamentary content.
Check the Tips for more information.

Share Updates :
Exam dates
Form release dates
Daily college life updates

Inspire others by sharing :
Interview experience
Interview preparation tips
Exam preparation strategy
Internship experience
Quick Tips

Discuss :
Questions
Concepts
Books
Industry News and Research
In-Depth How-To and List-Style Posts Chapters

Ask for feedback on :
Research paper
College projects
Start-up ideas
Prototypes
Assignments

Share good news :
Passing an exam
Passing certification course
Winning a competition
Raising funds

Announce :
Seminars
Tedx talks
Fest & events
Book launch
Collaboration
CSR activities

Search :
Co-founders
Internships
Investors
Mentor
Advisor
Volunteers

Organise :
Meetups
Study groups

To Create Opportunities :
You never know who can present you with the next opportunity. Connect with people who can help you in achieving your next education goal.

To gather info :
Connect to gather information about exams, colleges etc.

1. Publishing on Kriger Campus provides more value to connections who view your profile.
2. Your network can share your post, opening you up to a larger (and previously unreached) audience.
3. If your post is popular it will be shared by Kriger Campus official account, your potential reach is exponentially increased.
4. Publishing valuable content on Kriger Campus positions you as an authority on your topic.
Based on the trends of our community one post per day maximum to two posts a week minimum, this keeps your profile on top of your network.

It is the best education networking tool available today, and it is absolutely free.\nDedicate real time and effort to make the most of your connections, and you will establish worthwhile long-term relationships. Don’t SPAM with connection requests.\nDo treat your profile as your professional brochure. Use an appropriate-looking profile image and put in complete and up-to-date information. This will be your first impression for many.

Connect with other Krigers who can add value to your education plan. Take the time to find common ground based on your profiles and consider how you can bring reciprocal value.

Search Profiles :
Search for profiles based on your requirements and connect with only the required profiles do not blanket connect with every profile you see.

To Find Your Tribe :
Finding others who share your education interests is a great way to build your professional community.
OTP would be send to the following number for verification:

Kudos!! 
 You have exhausted your daily connection limit. 
 Kriger Campus ensures quality networking by suggesting profiles only for YOU based on multiple parameters. 
 Be back here tomorrow for more suggestions.
Oops! We need your permission to help you
<font color= #F44336>*</font>Name cannot be changed after you register.
<font color= #F44336>*</font>Update your profile picture and bio
*All fields above are mandatory, Contact won\'t be visible to others
